Posts.Content: Hello members I didn't know who else to talk to. I have fond a painful lump in my left breast seen doc and he has referred me to breast clinic to go and have tests done i am waiting to receivce appointment through the post so not sure if its cancer or not but as i'm young n got two young kids I am petrified and thinking the worst.   I was wondering if anyone else has felt like this n how you coped with the waiting, the not knowing , your mind playing tricks on you coz feel as if im not coping at the min?!
Posts.Title: Painful Lump

Posts.Content: Thank you for the replies you have helped me calm down and not to worry so much. Thanks again Annette
